The little bit of info I have for him on my site came from:

http://www2.plala.or.jp/shyall/retuden/sinsengumi.html

 

He was involved in investigations and left with Itou.  That is his connection to the Sekihoutai --- he survived the attack on Itou's group and stayed with Miki, probably becoming a member of the Second Patrol under Miki's command.

 

phil
